title: What is Civilization? How civilized are we? - Quora

response.answer_text: Civilization is nothing but a social and cultural development of the society. Here is the simple example of civilization Barter systems are now modernised to online trading Where 0’s and 1’s turned our life into the soulless life Pizza delivery is faster than ambulance service Early wake up is a disease and late night sleep is.
